plot: Date night turns into fight night when Vicki and her husband Donn find themselves in a sparring match over their marriage and the ladies all go to a Beverly Hills spa for some indulgent pampering.

In part two of the ladies' Canada trip, Lauri's accusations of Brooks' indiscretions launches the mother of all dinner table debacles. A snowmobile adventure takes a surprising turn, and a subzero vodka binge leaves Tamra tongue-tied. Back in Orange County, Heather guest stars on a new sitcom.—Anonymous
